title:
Drawing
Drawing, "Trees and a Rock, "near Whirlpool"", September 1858
medium: Graphite, brush and white gouache on light-brown paper.
inscribed: Inscribed in graphite, at top center ?: near (inscribed over: at) Whirlpool Niag / 1856, September [?].
description: Horizontal view of the Niagara river near the whirlpool with trees and a rock at top center.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing
Drawing, "Trees and a Rock, "near Whirlpool"", September 1858.
September 1858. Graphite, brush and white gouache on light-brown paper.. Gift of Louis P. Church. 1917-4-55-c.
